name: Interplanetary Convenience
description:
This is a short game. In a playthrough, you will have 4 alien customers who each want a specific product. Your job is to decipher their alien languages and get them what they want. The game has a storyline and a single ending. There is some slight horror in the game and one alien creature's language consists of one word: kill.

There is randomization in this game: the 4 aliens are drawn at random from a pool of 8. The wants are also randomized, from a pool of 3 per alien. I think this kind of randomization helps the game work as either a puzzle or a memory game. 

Some of the alien creatures in this game are unused characters I made for earlier games.

This game was worked on from May 20 - May 28, 2022.
